titleStmt.title: Holy pictures of the mysticall figures of the most holy sacrifice and sacrament of the Eucharist: set forth in French by Lewis Richome, prouinciall of the Societie of Iesus; and translated into English for the benefit of those of that nation, aswell protestants as Catholikes. By C.A.
Tableaux sacrez des figures mystiques du très auguste sacrifice et sacrement de l'Eucharistie. English
titleStmt.author: Richeome, Louis, 1544-1625.

titleStmt.title: Holy pictures of the mysticall figures of the most holy sacrifice and sacrament of the Eucharist: set forth in French by Lewis Richome, prouinciall of the Societie of Iesus; and translated into English for the benefit of those of that nation, aswell protestants as Catholikes. By C.A.
Tableaux sacrez des figures mystiques du très auguste sacrifice et sacrement de l'Eucharistie. English
titleStmt.author: Richeome, Louis, 1544-1625.
C. A., fl. 1619.
Anderton, Christopher, attributed name.
Apsley, Charles, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed with licence [at the Birchley Hall press?],

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Tableaux sacrez des figures mystiques du très auguste sacrifice et sacrement de l'Eucharistie.
Identification of printer conjectured by STC.
With a 31-line errata leaf, sometimes pasted onto the last page which contained 20 lines of errata. Variant: lacking the 31-line errata.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
